parameters.name: ProxyList
parameters.description: The IDs of the proxy nodes that you want to restart or rebuild. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ProxyNodeList
parameters.description: The IDs of the hosts on which the proxy nodes are deployed. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RebootMode
parameters.description:
The type of operation that you want to perform. Valid values:

*   **reboot**: restarts the proxy node.
*   **rebuild**: rebuilds the proxy node.
